name: Totally ordered multicast
description: Implementation of a totally ordered multicast library on top of java.nio.

name: MitM attacks against HTTPS over public wifi networks
description: Feasibility study, and implementation of attacks on HTTPS traffic over public wifi networks, and their consequences on users' data and privacy.

name: Deca compiler
description: A compiler which takes Deca (a subset of Java) as an input and outputs Assembly for the Motorola 68000 (simulated).
